keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: General Motors is recalling nearly 470,000 Chevrolet Malibus to fix potentially weakened steel cables that link the front seatbelts to the vehicles.

headline.print_headline: 470,000 Malibus Recalled for Faulty Seatbelt Cables
headline.main: 470,000 Malibus Recalled for Faulty Seatbelt Cables

snippet: General Motors is recalling nearly 470,000 Chevrolet Malibus to fix potentially weakened steel cables that link the front seatbelts to the vehicles.
abstract: General Motors will recall nearly 470,000 Chevrolet Malibu models to fix issue that could cause seatbelts to fail; will also recall 53,000 Chevy Colorado and GMC Canyon pickup trucks.
